title: Why Is Bitcoin Pumping? Experts Weigh In
description: The biggest digital coin is trading above $45,000 again. What’s causing the surge?

title: Worldcoin's Orb Will Be Used to Verify Identities of Esports Players
description: Community Gaming, a blockchain-based esports tournament platform, is integrating Worldcoin’s World ID to weed out cheaters.

title: Crypto custodial assets skyrocket by 250% in 2023, Bitget data shows
description: In 2023, the crypto custody market expands to $448B, attracting leading banks.

title: Argentine President Javier Milei Rules out Dollarization Process in 2024
description: Javier Milei, the libertarian president of Argentina, has ruled out the possibility of applying his dollarization plan during 2024. In an interview with local media, Milei stated that while dollarization and the free convertibility of coins was the final goal of his administration, there was no time to clean up the country’s economy and implement […]

title: CHAINLINK PRICE ANALYSIS & PREDICTION (February 8) – Link Faces Rejection After Breaking Out Of An Accumulation Phase, Pullback Lies Ahead
description: Chainlink recently broke out of an accumulation phase and is now up by 23% in seven days. It faced rejection and cooled off briefly. While the price remains strong, it may undergo a slight pullback to fuel a fresh increase. Following late January resurge from $13.3, Link climbed above the […]

title: TRON PRICE ANALYSIS & PREDICTION (February 8) – TRX Continues To Increase Daily As Price Doubled In A Year
description: While Tron ecosystem has attracted a lot of volumes in the past months, its price increased exponentially with over 100% gain in the past year. It is trending highly bullish this month following a recent breakout. The continuous increase in TRX’s price has gained a lot of traction amongst traders […]

title: LITECOIN PRICE ANALYSIS & PREDICTION (February 8) – LTC Remains Trapped Despite Recent Gains, Can It Break Above This Crucial Resistance?
description: Litecoin has shown little strength following the latest surge in Bitcoin’s price but it is still finding it difficult to push above its two-week high. An increase above $80 should bring the coin out of its short-term bearish phase. After rolling back to its local bottom in January, Litecoin saw […]

title: Craig Wright admits forging key documents to claim Satoshi Nakamoto identity
description: On the fourth day of the COPA v. Craig Wright trial, Wright conceded that many documents he presented to affirm his claim as Satoshi Nakamoto were indeed forged.

title: Kraken obtains Dutch license, expands crypto services in Europe
description: Kraken, a cryptocurrency exchange, has recently been licensed to operate in the Netherlands.
